alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Collier, northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Miccosukee Service Plaza, or 29 miles west of Pembroke Pines, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Miccosukee Indian Reservation, Miccosukee Service Plaza, Big Cypress National Preserve and West Broward Rec. Area On Alligator Alley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County
